body: Hi Francesco, You can read the material definition from Radiance Material Info component. For Radiance the type will be assigned using the integer value of the type (Wall has the same material as undergroundwall). You can change the default material by using "set radiance material" component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/l0-9MwVwNFFOAUXPFhrExK9QWIXqZmGeHqAS2j-bUOGHohyGYD11wuNk6EgclgEakTLRuuQNHatc4O6ucyG0-Uafk32AvWb5/radianceMaterials.png)
